experience: You and Paul both know Mark McMorrine, Jim Skidmore, and 139 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Responsible for managing multiple distributed, and mainframe projects, including Mobile Application, MS SQL2012/W2012 migration program, Microsoft Hyper-V, OS, server, application upgrades, and distributed data center migrations. Manage both programs and projects. Meet regularly w/ engineering and management teams. Organize cross-functional meetings. Manage budget. Track risks, issues, and action items. Prepare MS project plans, project Charters, Capacity Planning questionnaires. Initiate server hardware procurement, including EMC, Hitachi (thin provisioning) & Toshiba SAN, HBA cards, VMWare, and NAS. Experienced with IBM OS/VS, Linux, Solaris/AIX, MS Windows Server, Oracle and DB2 database. Update iKnow Sharepoint repository and Projects in Motion web sites with project status information and project artifacts. Report project status to upper management. Track risks with relation to scope, schedule, budget, and quality, and update mitigation/contingency plans accordingly. Prepare, monitor, and have over-site of Work Requests for various work groups. Utilize Change Requests, SOWs, Go Live documents, GLOW Requests, Requirements Gathering Forms, SLAs, Failover Cert, Business Information Form, Server Information Forms. Involved with Disaster Recovery planning, testing, and implementation. Use the following tools: Remedy, Clarity, IQNavigator, GLOW Workspace, PIM, iKnow repository, PMDB Project sharepoint,  My Systems, Microsoft Office products, among others.

Responsible for managing multiple Infra projects, including refreshing servers, DesktopPlus Citrix Server Upgrade, SAN installation, WAS migration, decommissioning apps, develop app and Database servers and clusters, installing virtual servers using VMWare, migrating domain controllers, data center/infrastructure projects, load balancing, end queue, AutoSys.  Also work with Disaster Recovery (DR) teams, and familiar with UNIX, LINUX, Windows, and NT operation systems. Ensure AMEX/IBM processes are followed, deliverables and milestones are prepared, and projects are completed on time within budget. Prepare project plans, analyze and develop RFS estimates. Utilize Delivery Engagement Tracking Tool (DET) for requirements and solution preparation. Meet regularly w/ dev teams. Organize cross-functional organizational meetings. Manage budget. Track risks, issues, and action items. Manage, plan, design, test, and implement projects. Report project status to upper management.

Responsible for managing multiple TIMS (Technology Infrastructure Management Systems) AMEX Infrastructure projects, including SAN installation, ordering and building application, Web,  and Database servers and clusters, installing virtual servers using VMWare and SUN zones, data center/infrastructure projects, load balancing.  Also work with Disaster Recovery (DR) teams, and familiar with UNIX, LINUX, Solaris, and Windows operating systems. Ensure AMEX processes are followed, deliverables and milestones are prepared, and projects are completed on time within budget. Prepare project plans, MS Project schedules, analyze and develop project estimates. Engage in solution preparation. Meet regularly w/ development and business teams. Organize cross-functional organizational meetings. Manage budget. Track risks, issues, and action items. Responsible for management of planning, designing, testing, and implementing projects. Report project status to upper management.

summary: Results-oriented PMP certified project manager with proven track record of successful Banking/Finance Information Technology and Aerospace Manufacturing Operations application implementations. Proficient in accomplishing substantial bottom-line savings. Expertise includes managing infrastructure projects, e-business application projects, process re-engineering, budget management and planning, use of 6-sigma tools, leading and motivating cross-functional teams, and total quality management methodologies. Have strong Information Technology, Banking, Industrial Engineering, Aerospace Manufacturing Operations and Financial backgroundSpecialties: Manage multiple Infrastructure projects, including server decommissions, server upgrades, SAN installation, develop application and Database servers and clusters, installing virtual servers using VMWare, data center/infrastructure projects, load balancing. Meet regularly w/ development teams. Organize cross-functional organizational meetings. Manage budget. Track risks, issues, and action items. Responsible for management of planning, designing, testing, and implementing projects.
